folder.body: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? All files and subfolders within it will be removed.

file.body: Are you sure you want to delete this file?

deleteDrive.title: Delete "{{label}}" drive?
deleteDrive.body: Are you sure you want to delete this drive? All files and subfolders within it will be removed. Do you want to proceed?

upgradeDrive.body: You are moving files from a private to a shared drive. These files will become accessible to others in the shared drive.Do you want to proceed?

connectSettings.title: Settings
connectSettings.body: These settings will apply to all drives.

confirmation.title: Clear Storage
confirmation.body: Are you sure you want to clear the storage? This will remove all previous session data.

exportDocumentWithErrors.title: Your document contains errors
exportDocumentWithErrors.body: Your document contains structure errors. Do you want to export it anyway?

notifications.reloadApp: It seems like you're running an outdated version of the app. Please reload Connect to get the latest version.
